summary: N.W.A was an American hip-hop group from Compton, California, known for their gangsta rap style. They were controversial because of their explicit lyrics about crime and drugs. Despite this, they were very popular and sold millions of albums. The group, active from 1987 to 1991, consisted of Dr. Dre, Eazy-E, Ice Cube, DJ Yella, and MC Ren. Their debut album, "Straight Outta Compton," started a new era in rap music. N.W.A is considered one of the greatest hip-hop groups and was inducted into the Rock and Roll Hall of Fame in 2016.
title: N.W.A
